text: $MSFT As long as the 1/25 low remains intact, the instrument remains in the sideways zone.  We don’t like to trade the sideways area, only like to trade the extreme areas in 3, 7 or 11 swing.   It is favouring more downside is taking place in the next cycle lower we don’t like to trade this on the long side without a blue box. #Elliottwave #Trading #Stocks
